translation.ace: "Notasi posisi (cit dikeunai seubagai""notasi nilai tumpat"") meungacu bak representasi atau peunyediaan angka meupakek simbol yeng sama untuk urutan rayek yeng meubeda (meusi jih, ""tumpat sa"",""tumpat ploh"", ""tumpat reutoh"") ngen, deungen titek radix, meupakek simbol yeng sama untuk mawakili pecahan (meuse jih , ""tumpat persiploh"", ""tumpat persereutoh"")."
translation.en: Positional notation (also known as "place-value notation") refers to the representation or encoding of numbers using the same symbol for the different orders of magnitude (e.g., the "ones place", "tens place", "hundreds place") and, with a radix point, using those same symbols to represent fractions (e.g., the "tenths place", "hundredths place").

translation.ace: Padim bungong meukawen ngen seksual, na padim cit yang aseksual, dan padim jih lewat penyerbukan
translation.en: Some plants reproduce sexually, some asexually, and some via both means.

translation.ace: Peuradaban laen di Afrika maju seulama periode nyoe.
translation.en: Other civilizations in Africa advanced during this period.

translation.ace: Ubé yang kana defenisi keutat tentang kaisar, nyan adalah bahwa hana hubungan yang menyiratkan bahwa penguasa laen leubèh superior dan biasa jih geuperintah leubèh dari saboh negara
translation.en: In as much as there is a strict definition of emperor, it is that an emperor has no relations implying the superiority of any other ruler and typically rules over more than one nation.

translation.ace: Bak jameuen beusoe, peuradaban moderen dikeumbangkan peng seubagoe alat tuka keu alat tuka yang seumaken kompleks
translation.en: By the early Iron Age, contemporary civilizations developed money as a medium of exchange for increasingly complex transactions.

translation.ace: Pendanaan federal merupakan sebagian ubeut dari pendanaan keu ke kemanusiaan dari pada yang laen lage batang atau ubat-ubat
translation.en: Federal funding represents a much smaller fraction of funding for humanities than other fields such as STEM or medicine.

translation.ace: Na saran bahwasan jih ata nyang geu peuget genetika nyo jeut jipakek untuk supaya binatang bek punah.
translation.en: There have been suggestions that genetic engineering could be used to bring animals back from extinction.

translation.ace: Keuneuk cuba pesan udeueng sabe, menu baro di gading resto. kualitah rasa cukop mangat,  yum pih murah. Jeuet keu saran meunyo ta ba jamee atawa untuk pajoh bu malam ngon awak rumoh mantong
translation.en: Tried ordering shabu-shabu, the new menu in Gading Resto. The taste was pretty good, affordable too. Recommended if you wanna invite guests or just have a family dinner

translation.ace: Bintang" terbukti hi ngon matauroe i bumo nyan keudro ,tapi deungon beu macam suhu, mass ngen ukuran .
translation.en: Stars were proven to be similar to the Earth's own Sun, but with a wide range of temperatures, masses, and sizes.

translation.ace: Karena krôh ie nyang leubeh rendah cahya mata uroe jeut itamoög lam Nil.
translation.en: Because of the lower turbidity of the water sunlight penetrates deeper in the Nile water.

translation.ace: Untuk meuteumee peumandangan nyang lagak ngon cahya lampu wareuna-wareuni, leubeh get neujak malam. Saweueb na deuh likot peumandangan tutue Pasupati nyang jeuet keu simbol kota.
translation.en: To get a beautiful view with colourful lights, it's best to visit at night. This is due to the Pasupati Bridge, which is the city's symbol, in the background.

translation.ace: kupi nyang paleng mangat inoe nakeuh kupi pokat ngon kupi pisang. kupi jampu pokat hana roh peuget rasa kupijih gadoh, pah keu lidah lon nyang galak kupi teujampu-jampu. ragam makanan nyang dipeusaji pih mangat, nyang paleng lon galak kentang gurengjih untuk yum nyang cukop murah
translation.en: The best coffee here are the avocado coffee and banana coffee. The avocado doesn't ruin the coffee flavour at all, perfect for my taste as a mixed coffee lover. The food they serve is also pretty tasty, my favorite being their french fries for an affordable price

translation.ace: Nyan kadang geusebut ngon "Nanggroe Bosques" (atau Euskadi) le penuleh ngon lembaga publik mantong geupeutimbankan keulhe propinsi barat, tapi na sit bak kesempatan digunakan sebagoe singkatan menyoe hana jeut keu masalah dalam konteks nyan
translation.en: It is sometimes referred to simply as "the Basque Country" (or Euskadi) by writers and public agencies only considering those three western provinces, but also on occasions merely as a convenient abbreviation when this does not lead to confusion in the context.

translation.ace: Contoh umum laen jih adalah fungsi keusalahan.
translation.en: Another common example is the error function.

translation.ace: Hard drive berbasi magnetoresistance raksasa yeng kalheh na di pasran seusuai deungen deskripsi nyo, lage hai jih teknik deposisi lapehsan atom (ALD).
translation.en: Giant magnetoresistance-based hard drives already on the market fit this description, as do atomic layer deposition (ALD) techniques.

translation.ace: Keynes berpeunapat bahawa peumitaan agregat untok barang mungken han mencukopi yoh watee kemerosotan ekonomi sampoe mengakebatkan pengangguran ngon leunyap jih output nyang potensial.
translation.en: Keynes contended that aggregate demand for goods might be insufficient during economic downturns, leading to unnecessarily high unemployment and losses of potential output.

translation.ace: Frankfort, Kentucky, diteungeh-teungeh antara . Louisville and Lexington.
translation.en: Frankfort, Kentucky, midway between Louisville and Lexington.

translation.ace: Keuneuk jak u hotel nyang di mongkok hongkong, hana! buleuen juni nyang ka leupah, lon ka lheueh pesan dan bayeue untuk dua boh kama. Tapi hoteljih hana merumpok.
translation.en: I wanted go to a hotel in Mong Kok, Hongkong, but turns out there was no hotel! Last June, I've booked and paid for 2 rooms. But the hotel was nowhere to be found.

translation.ace: Persyaratan kemitraan ladom diatue uleh perjanjian kemitraan meunyoe dipeuget, ngon ladom le uleh hukom yurisdiksi pat kemitraan nyang na.
translation.en: The terms of a partnership are partly governed by a partnership agreement if one is created, and partly by the law of the jurisdiction where the partnership is located.

translation.ace: nibak republik akhe, lagee nibak thon-thon awai monarki baro, imperator nyan adalah geular yang dibri keu jendral romawi oleh pasukan awak nyan dan senat romawi leuh kemenangan yang rayek, kira-kira seubandeng deungen marshal lapangan ( keupala atau komandan mandum pasukan)
translation.en: In the late Republic, as in the early years of the new monarchy, Imperator was a title granted to Roman generals by their troops and the Roman Senate after a great victory, roughly comparable to field marshal (head or commander of the entire army).

translation.ace: Nyan beurdasarkan drama yang ka hayeu, The New Henrietta, yang ka geumeuen film sige deungon Judul The Lamb, deungon Douglas Fairbanks seubagoe peumeuen yang utama
translation.en: It was based on a successful play, The New Henrietta, which had already been filmed once, under the title The Lamb, with Douglas Fairbanks playing the lead.

translation.ace: Bak akhe Abad Peutengehan, biografi jeut kureng berorientasi bak geureja di Eropa kareuna biografi raja, ksatria, ngen tiran mulai tubit.
translation.en: By the late Middle Ages, biographies became less church-oriented in Europe as biographies of kings, knights, and tyrants began to appear.

translation.ace: Demikian cir, persentase keumenangan tim, fraksi peutandingan yeng dimeunangkan klub, cit biasa jih dikhen seubagai proporsi decimal; tim yeng na persentase keumenangan .500 lheh meumenangkan 50% dari peutandingan awak nyan.
translation.en: Likewise, the winning percentage of a team, the fraction of matches that the club has won, is also usually expressed as a decimal proportion; a team that has a .500 winning percentage has won 50% of their matches.

translation.ace: Pengetahuan teuntang penyandian simpul ngen warna diteugen le para penakluk Spanyol bak abad keu-16, ngen hana meutahan meskipun alat peureukam seuderhana l,age quipu mantenf dipakek di wilayah Andes.
translation.en: Knowledge of the encodings of the knots and colors was suppressed by the Spanish conquistadors in the 16th century, and has not survived although simple quipu-like recording devices are still used in the Andean region.

translation.ace: Pencarian informasi nyang terkaet berbida dari pencarian informasi (IR).
translation.en: Information seeking is related to, but different from, information retrieval (IR).

translation.ace: Saboh contoh bahawa ikatan hidrogen nyan diteumengkan antara molekul ie.
translation.en: A ubiquitous example of a hydrogen bond is found between water molecules.

translation.ace: Studi 2011 di Wairau Bar di Selandia Baru dipeutunyok kemungkinan rayek bahwa salah saboh asal jih adalah pulau Ruahine di Kepulauan Society.
translation.en: 2011 studies at Wairau Bar in New Zealand show a high probability that one origin was Ruahine Island in the Society Islands.

translation.ace: Bak eksperimenjih yang mempelajari sifat warna bungong, Mendel seutot bahwa bungong bakdalam setiap tanaman kacang polong berwarna ungu atau puteh—tetapi hanjeut menjadi perantara antara kedua warna nyan.
translation.en: In his experiments studying the trait for flower color, Mendel observed that the flowers of each pea plant were either purple or white—but never an intermediate between the two colors.

translation.ace: Awak kereuja rumeh. peugot hawa keuneuk jak lom. pah that kayem cit meudom disinoe, hoteljih gleh ngon pemandangan dari kama hotel pih lagak
translation.en: The server is so friendly. Makes me always wanna come back. I just so happen to stay here a lot, the hotel is clean and the view from the room is great

translation.ace: linguis laen kaleuh geuteliti lam bidang kontak bahasa, bahasa yang bahasa, dan bahasa inggreh sebagai bahasa ban mandum
translation.en: Other linguists have carried out research in the areas of language contact, language endangerment, and 'English as a global language'.

translation.ace: Bahkan peumotongan yang leubèh ekstrim kalheh dipakek: atlas sikula Finlandia jiekoh bak kira-kira 76°LU ngen 56°LS, deungen rasio aspek 1.97.
translation.en: Even more extreme truncations have been used: a Finnish school atlas was truncated at approximately 76°N and 56°S, an aspect ratio of 1.97.

translation.ace: Oktober 2006 keutat jih proses regulasi, konsolidasi kontrol pasokan makanan i perusahaan nyang ipeuget ngon ipublo GMOs, geu peulebeh-leubeh manfaat modifikasi genetik, atawa kekhawatiran ateuh penggunaan herbisida ngen glisofat.
translation.en: October 2006 the rigor of the regulatory process, consolidation of control of the food supply in companies that make and sell GMOs, exaggeration of the benefits of genetic modification, or concerns over the use of herbicides with glyphosate.

translation.ace: Polynomial itubit di mandum bidang matematika ngen sains.
translation.en: Polynomials appear in many areas of mathematics and science.

translation.ace: Penyerbukan silang adalah perpindahan serbuk sari bak uleebsari nyang saboh ke bungong sampe ulee bak putik laen pada individu nyang berbeda atau hana saban dari spesies yang saban.
translation.en: Cross-pollination is the transfer of pollen from the anther of one flower to the stigma of another flower on a different individual of the same species.

translation.ace: "Atawa peu tanyo ta pake algoritme nyang tok jeut geubri tanyo solusi ""itameng akai"" (miseu jih, metode probabilistik) teutapi mungken jeut keu mangsa kesalahan han teu baca nyang sama ngen nyang ji peuget le intuisi manusia?"
translation.en: Or do we use algorithms that can only give us a "reasonable" solution (e.g., probabilistic methods) but may fall prey to the same kind of inscrutable mistakes that human intuition makes?

translation.ace: Na padup-padup boeh kelompok kaleuh ji kembangkan engkot zebra untuk ji deteksi ngen cara ji tipek protein fluoresen ke gen nyang kaleuh ji peu aktifkan le polutan.
translation.en: Several groups have been developing zebrafish to detect pollution by attaching fluorescent proteins to genes activated by the presence of pollutants.
